title: 12 Minutes on Elm Street
description: In this Dateline classic, the families of Nicholas Brady and Haile Kifer start to fear the worst when the teenage cousins don’t show up for Thanksgiving dinner in their hometown of Little Falls, Minnesota. Originally aired on NBC on May 16, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
